content.raw:
In testing on my machine, it's having trouble locating the `dylib` file during the test:

~~~
$ export IGN_CONFIG_PATH=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/build/test/conf
$ ign msg --list
Library error: [/Users/scpeters/ws/ignition/src/ign-msgs/build/src/cmd/libignition-msgs1.dylib] not found.
~~~

We could look for some inspiration from the ign-transport pull request, which addresses this same issue:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/298/make-ign-transport-compatible-with-ign/diff
